attributes.action: Reallocate a Minister for Women and Equality
attributes.additional_details: On her Wikipedia page it states 'In October 2014, she clarified her views saying she had previously voted against gay marriage as she believed her constituents were opposed to it. However she would now support it and she wished "supporters of same-sex marriage had been more vocal about their position before vote in July last year"'. This is utter rubbish as there is a lot of hypocrisy within her views and she doesn't seem capable of standing up for equality. This clearly shows she is not suitable for the job.
attributes.background: Nicky Morgan is the current Minister for Women and Equality in the UK. This doesn't seem to make sense as in 2013 she voted against same-sex marriage.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a different person to do a specific job.
